content.description:
The following item refers to a snake frightening Ted.

Ted is hiking along a mountain trail when he sees a large snake slithering across the path ahead of him.
content.question: After the incident, Ted develops a specific phobia of snakes. Which of the following therapeutic techniques will be most effective for eliminating Ted’s phobia?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
